name: Circle Pong (itch) (effe)
description:
CIRCLE PONG
Pong, in a circle

INSTRUCTIONS:
Hit your opponents side of the circle with the ball to get a point. 
First to get 7 points wins.

CONTROLS:
Paddle one:
W: up
S: down

Paddle two:
Up arrow: up
Down arrow: down

CREDITS:
Game developed in Unity game engine
https://unity3d.com

Audio made using BFRX
https://www.bfxr.net/

Font used LCD Solid
https://www.fontspace.com/lcd-solid/lcd-solid

This game is based on this tutorial:
https://www.awesomeincu.com/tutorials/unity-pong/
